issue.title: [CF 1472] Blizz Spell Proc
issue.body:
I'm looking for a way to replace the standard spell alert proc skins that show up around the sides of the character.  Can this be done?  If so, how and if not is this going to be added in the future.


> Posted by CurseForge user mwcrader | Imported from CurseForge issue #1472 | Raw

comments.body:
Unclear on what you're asking. Do you want to replace those images with different images? Do you wish to replicate their behavior with TMW icons? Do you just want to disable them?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
